content_blocks.label: Commitment and Values
content_blocks.title: Crafted with Precision & Excellence
content_blocks.description: At La Viet Signs, we are committed to providing high-quality, custom-designed acrylic and foam board products tailored to elevate your space and events. Our products, including Acrylic Welcome Signs, Custom Acrylic LED Centerpieces, Foam Board Standees, and Wedding Signage, are crafted with premium materials and expert precision to ensure durability and elegance. Whether for home decor, branding, or special occasions, our designs bring your vision to life. Experience the perfect blend of craftsmanship, innovation, and style with our exclusive range of products.

list_review.title: Good Soap!
list_review.description: I love the soaps so much. I keep buying various fragnances. I think the most favourite ones are almond, lemongrass and epices. I have sensitive skin prone to eczema and this product does not cause problems.
list_review.author: Martha griffin

content_blocks.label: Our Commitment & Craftsmanship
content_blocks.title: Bringing Your Vision to Life with Quality & Precision
content_blocks.description: At La Viet Signs, we take pride in crafting high-quality, custom acrylic and foam board products that enhance your space and events. Our wide range of products, from Acrylic Welcome Signs to Custom Acrylic LED Centerpieces, Foam Board Standees, and Wedding Signage, is designed with meticulous attention to detail. Using premium materials and advanced printing techniques, we create long-lasting and visually striking pieces. Whether you're looking for home decor, branding elements, or event signage, our products are tailored to suit your unique needs.

list_product.title: Custom QR Code Sign
list_product.description: Enhance your decor with our Acrylic Text Signs, designed for a modern and stylish touch. Made from high-quality acrylic, these custom-cut letters and words are perfect for home decor, businesses, weddings, and events. Choose from a variety of fonts, colors, and finishes, including mirror, frosted, and glossy styles, to match your aesthetic. Lightweight and easy to install, they make a bold statement anywhere. Order your custom acrylic text sign today!

list_review.title: Professional QR Code Design!
list_review.description: I'm really impressed with the custom QR code design they created for my business. It's not only visually appealing but also works perfectly. Connecting with customers has never been easier!
list_review.author: Minh Anh

list_review.title: Stunning Acrylic Welcome Sign!
list_review.description: We ordered a custom acrylic welcome sign for our wedding and it was absolutely beautiful! The design was elegant and modern, and the quality was top-notch. It added a special touch to our celebration. Highly recommend!
list_review.author: Lan Anh & Quang Huy
list_review.image_alt: Acrylic Welcome Sign for Lan Anh & Quang Huy's Wedding

list_review.title: Unique and Impressive Trophy Logo!
list_review.description: I requested a trophy logo design for our company's award event and the result exceeded my expectations. The design is very unique, professional, and captures the spirit of the event. Thank you so much!
list_review.author: Hong Nhung

content_blocks.title: Custom Acrylic LED Center Pieces
content_blocks.description: Illuminate your space with our Custom Acrylic LED Centerpieces, perfect for adding a modern and elegant touch to your home or office. Crafted from high-quality acrylic with custom engraved or printed designs, these unique table decorations feature built-in LED lighting for a warm, ambient glow. Ideal for living rooms, desks, shelves, or bedside tables, they make a stunning statement piece. Personalize yours today for a one-of-a-kind decorative accent!

content_blocks.title: Flat Acrylic Invite
content_blocks.description: Elevate your event with our Flat Acrylic Invite, a sleek and modern invitation crafted from premium-quality acrylic. Perfect for weddings, birthdays, and corporate events, this stylish invite adds a touch of sophistication to any occasion. With crystal-clear transparency, customizable designs, and UV-printed details, it creates a lasting impression. Order now for a luxurious, high-end invitation that stands out!

content_blocks.title: Wedding Invites
content_blocks.description: Celebrate your love with our Elegant Wedding Invites, crafted from high-quality paper with exquisite designs. Featuring luxury textures, foil stamping, and elegant typography, our invitations set the perfect tone for your special day. Whether you prefer classic, modern, or minimalist styles, each invite is fully customizable to reflect your unique love story. Order now for a timeless and sophisticated wedding invitation!

content_blocks.title: Foam Board Standees
content_blocks.description: Enhance your promotions with our Foam Board Standees, crafted from durable, lightweight foam board for a sleek and professional display. Perfect for events, trade shows, retail stores, and advertising, these standees feature high-resolution printing, vibrant colors, and custom shapes to make your message stand out. Easy to set up and transport, they are an ideal solution for eye-catching marketing. Order your custom foam board standee today!

content_blocks.title: Foam Board Wedding
content_blocks.description: Add a touch of elegance to your special day with our Foam Board Wedding Signs, crafted from high-quality, lightweight foam board. Perfect for welcome signs, seating charts, photo backdrops, and directional signs, these boards feature vibrant printing, custom designs, and a smooth matte finish for a sophisticated look. Easy to set up and transport, they are the ideal decor solution for any wedding theme. Order your custom wedding foam board today!
